subject: Error message in the latest Espeak 1.26
body:
Hi,
just downloaded and installed Espeak 1.26. Everything OK so far, but in
/var/log/speech-dispatcher/espeak.log
I found the following message:
Wrong version of espeak-data 0x12514 (expects 0x12601)
The same appears when starting the stand-allone version of Espeak.
Any idea what's wrong?
Hermann

_______________________________________________
Speakup mailing list
Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
